Step Forward
From The Challenge: A great opportunity
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for expressing your interest in Step Forward, now it’s time to apply!
Make the wise decision about your future and apply now for our incredibly exciting school leavers’ programme beginning in August 2015!
Just as a reminder, what is it?
Step Forward is a London based programme which provides school and college leavers with a chance to spend a year in the world of work with a top quality employer. As a Step Forward Associate, you’ll get invaluable experience, fantastic training and a qualification - all whilst benefiting from the help and advice of an experienced mentor.
Get paid to do real work for a high quality employer, make new friends and develop the skills you’ll need to get ahead in life, whether that is going on to University or continuing in the world of work in the year beyond Step Forward.
How do I apply?
Step Forward is a competitive programme and places are limited. To be considered for our next assessment event in October half term, the deadline for submitting applications is Sunday 12th October. Apply with your unique application form Here.
Best wishes,
